revised_title: In Memoriam: Major James Rennell and Other Eminent Members of the Royal Society
tldr: The President of the Royal Society, Davies Gilbert, delivers an address in memory of Major James Rennell and other esteemed members who passed away in the previous year. Rennell, a distinguished geographer and surveyor, made significant contributions to the fields of geography, cartography, and science. The address also highlights the accomplishments of other members, such as Mr. Chenevix and Mr. James Lewis Smithson.
